Personal Injury Law Firm Georgetown, DC

As a full-service law firm of lawyers who are both experienced and passionate, The Romano Law Firm works toward gaining fair compensation for every Georgetown personal injury client. If you or someone you know has been injured by another, representation by a reputable personal injury law firm is the best option for securing future financial security. We represent clients with anything from minor injuries to D.C. auto accident clients.


Our Georgetown personal injury attorneys have experience handling a wide variety of personal injury cases, and we understand that even minor injuries can have significant physical, financial, and psychological consequences. Because of that understanding, we do everything in our power to get you the relief you deserve. We will make your voice heard in the face of the insurance companies so you can get on with your life.

Choosing a Personal Injury Law Firm in Georgetown

We know how many Georgetown personal injury law firms are out there. Despite all of the choices you will be faced with when you decide to be represented, it is vital to your future financial security that you find a quality firm that will work with you. At the Romano Law Firm, we treat each client as an individual and each case as unique. You will never be plugged into an assembly-line, formulaic approach.


We take additional steps by using a team of legal and medical professionals that will help guide you toward recovery while documenting your injuries carefully. This documentation has potential to aid us in getting you more financial relief than you otherwise would.


Do not waste valuable time that could be spent fighting for you. Call the Romano Law Firm today for a consultation. As soon as you call, you will be assigned a Georgetown personal injury attorney who will meet with you and fight for your financial recovery. We are a D.C. personal injury law firm, with the ability to meet with clients all throughout the area, including Dupont Circle and Southwest Waterfront.

Call today at (813) 293-9000.


Our attorneys can drive or fly anywhere to meet. We also offer webcam appointments. One of our main offices is located at:
